title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 567.9 - Waiving the rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 567.9 - Waiving the rules and regulations

State Regulations

The specific provisions and limitations contained in this

Part may be waived by the Director of Employee Relations whenever he/she
determines that strict adherence to the rules would be detrimental to the sound
and orderly administration of State government. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
567.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
